# ARPointCloud

**Class**

A collection of points in the world coordinate space of the AR session.

## Declaration

```swift
class ARPointCloud
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame] [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/rawFeaturePoints] property to obtain a point cloud representing intermediate results of the scene analysis ARKit uses to perform world tracking.

## Identifying Feature Points

- **points**: The list of detected points.
- **identifiers**: A list of unique identifiers corresponding to detected feature points.

## Video Frame Analysis

- **Displaying a point cloud using scene depth**: Present a visualization of the physical environment by placing points based a scene’s depth data.
- **Creating a fog effect using scene depth**: Apply virtual fog to the physical environment.
- **ARFrame**: A video image captured as part of a session with position-tracking information.
- **ARDepthData**: An object that describes the distance to regions of the real world from the plane of the camera.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
